name: terrible_teddies_battle_of_the_bearistocrats
description: "Terrible Teddies: Battle of the Bear-ristocrats" is a strategically engaging and humorously themed card battling game set in the Stuffed Realm, a world where teddy bears vie for power and influence. This project combines a rich, adult-themed narrative with a complex deck-building and dueling system, all brought to life through web technologies. Notably, the game features a unique collection of pre-generated bear images, ensuring a visually consistent and engaging experience for players.
